activities: LORD will hold and use information, including Personal Data, concerning its employees in connection with their employment. LORD receives Personal Data of employees in connection with the management and administration of pre-employment, employment and post-employment matters.    LORD occasionally collects Personal Data about customers and suppliers to complete purchase and sale transactions or to provide services.  When information, such as name, mailing address, email address, and type of request, is collected it may be used and stored by LORD to complete a transaction or provide a customer additional information.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Aircraft & Parts - (AIR)Automotive Parts & Service Equipment - (APS)Electronic Components - (ELC)Oil & Gas Field Machinery - (OGM)
personaldata: human resources data, on line data,
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
